27678.summary: Some customers in the Thompson area of Richmond are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
27678.title: Oct 21 – Richmond (Thompson) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
